note: Nonbinary (they/them), Lokean, ace, autistic, disabled, has PTSD. Likes writing poetry, composing digital tunes, playing videogames, and drawing stuff. A tangled yarn ball of anxiety. Also a HUGE nerd, especially when it comes to mythology or linguistics.

name: Deities
value: Loki (patron), Norse deities in general, Pan, Dionysus, Hermes, Hephaestus, Janus

name: Special Interests
value: mythology, languages, pre-gunpowder tech, ancient cultures, architecture (esp. castles and fortifications), pokemon

name: Favorite Games
value: Pokemon X/Y, BotW, Civ 5, Sims 3, Bastion, ES: Oblivion, Dark Cloud 2, Ecco 2, Dragon Quest 9, Okami, Rune Factory 4

name: Favorite Shows/Movies
value: Avatar: The Last Airbender, Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., Kuroshitsuji, Steven Universe, Dragon Prince, She-Ra, Doctor Who, literally anything by Hayao Miyazaki, Star Trek: Next Gen
